divs: Sighting Detailswe noticed a orange fog rising above the swamp and creek slowley following the creek. then stopped.got brighter. lights flashing. then a beam of clear light focused on our cabin we had a fan running the beam focused on the fan and you could see clearly through the ceiling and roof for a minute or so we sat quitely nobody said anything. then the beam retracted, and slowley the object left out of sight. we were camping out over the weekend. nobody mentioned it again,until the next weekend
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ashland
This sighting has never been favorited.
